Module chav1961.purelib

Package chav1961.purelib.basic.exceptions

This package contains all exception definitions for the the library. Most of all exceptions are children of the Exception. They are used in all the packages of the library.

Hierarchy of exceptions in the package is:

  • PureLibException - root of all checked exceptions in the Pure Library
    • CalculationException - fires on any calculation errors
    • ContentException - fires on any content errors
      • CommandLineParametersException - fires on any errors in commands typed
      • ConsoleCommandException - fires on any errors in command lines
      • SyntaxException - fires on any errors when parsing from string representation
        • MimeParseException - special type of SyntaxException to parse MIM strings
      • PrintingException - fires on any errors when building string representation
      • TestException - fires on any errors on testing
    • EnvironmentException - fires on any errors in the application environment
    • FlowException - fires on any errors on data flow processing
    • DebuggingException - fires on any errors on content debugging
  • RuntimeException - root of all runtime exceptions in the Pure Library
    • PreparationException - fires on any initialization errors in any classes (especially in static initializers)

It's strongly recommended to use all the exceptions in according to their's predefined roles were typed earlier

Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
LastUpdate:
0.0.4
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CalculationException
    This exception describes any problems on any calculations.
    CommandLineParametersException
    This exception describes any problems on command line parameters.
    ConsoleCommandException
    This exception describes any problems on command string processing (from console or command line).
    ContentException
    This exception describes any problems on content parsing of data.
    DebuggingException
    This exception is used for remote debuggers only and should not be use on any other purposes.
    EnvironmentException
    This exception describes any problems in the Pure Library environment.
    FlowException
    This exception describes any problems on any flow processing.
    LocalizationException
    This exception describes any problems in the library environment, related to localization environment.
    MimeParseException
    This exception describes specific problems on MOME content parsing.
    PreparationException
    This exception was developed especially for indicating problems in the static blocks of your classes.
    PrintingException
    This exception describes any problems on writing data into the stream (not only printers)
    PureLibException
    This exception is a root of all Pure Library exceptions.
    SyntaxException
    This exception describes any problems on syntax during parsing any kind of data.
    TestException
    This exception is used by testing entities to fire testing exceptions.
